name: Isurium
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Ludum Dare 48

Unfinished game where you explore an interactive postcard to see the different things you can reveal underneath the surface.

Art this time was done by my brother.

Controls:

Currently only 4 real clickable objects but have 4 different actions done so ready for more to be put in.
